title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - PetDNAAnalyzer (Revised)
description: This RFC outlines the project's objectives, features, user stories, acceptance criteria for the PetDNAAnalyzer tool. The scope includes defining the system architecture (frontend: UI design & interaction, backend: server-side logic), detailing wireframes or mockups for the user interface, outlining data management strategies (data storage: database design, retrieval: API endpoints, processing methods: algorithms and libraries), specifying necessary security measures (encryption, authentication, authorization, OWASP top 10 considerations), privacy policies (GDPR, CCPA compliance), and third-party API integrations (breed databases, health risk factors APIs). This RFC is in DRAFT state, awaiting further refinement and approval. Once approved, it will be passed on to the task-decomposer for detailed task breakdown.

title: Design User Interface for PetDNAAnalyzer
description: Create wireframes and mockups for the frontend, considering ease of use, accessibility, and aesthetics.

title: Develop Frontend for PetDNAAnalyzer
description: Build the frontend of the tool using a chosen framework, ensuring it's responsive and user-friendly.

title: Design and Implement Backend Architecture
description: Plan and implement the backend architecture, including API design, databases, and server infrastructure.

title: Develop Backend for PetDNAAnalyzer
description: Build the backend of the tool, connecting it to the frontend through APIs, managing data storage and processing.

title: Integrate Frontend with Backend
description: Connect the frontend with the backend by implementing the designed APIs, ensuring seamless data flow between components.

title: Implement DNA Analysis Algorithm
description: Create an algorithm to analyze pet DNA samples, providing insights into breed composition, health risks, and personalized care recommendations.

title: Test PetDNAAnalyzer
description: Perform functional, integration, and system testing to ensure the tool works as intended.

title: Write Documentation for PetDNAAnalyzer
description: Create comprehensive documentation, including user manuals, API references, and developer guides.

title: Review and Optimize Codebase
description: Perform a code review, ensuring adherence to best practices, optimization, and security.
